trans-unit.source: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 識別匿名使用者是否能設定或存取設定檔屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作屬性，如果使用者是匿名的使用者。

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 如需啟用匿名識別資訊，請參閱組態項目的提供的文件。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>指定了不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中指定的自訂使用者設定檔類型`inherits`的組態項目，如下列範例所示的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> to create a custom profile.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例定義一個類別，繼承自<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>建立自訂的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application.
trans-unit.target: 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if anonymous users can access the associated profile property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匿名使用者可以存取相關的設定檔屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute" /> class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，並指定是否允許匿名存取相關的設定檔屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>類別用來識別是否可存取的自訂設定檔實作屬性，如果使用者是匿名的使用者。

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 如需啟用匿名識別資訊，請參閱組態項目。

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>指定了不允許設定檔屬性，設定檔屬性的匿名存取。

trans-unit.source: A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 自訂設定檔實作是繼承自一個類別<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>抽象類別，並定義使用者設定檔中的組態項目未指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class to create a custom profile.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會定義類別繼承自<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>類別來建立自訂的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the configuration element in the Web.config file for an application.
trans-unit.target: 已在指定的自訂設定檔類型`inherits`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的組態項目的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 如需組態檔中指定自訂設定檔實作的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出匿名使用者是否能存取自訂設定檔實作的相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if anonymous users can access the associated profile property; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果匿名使用者可以存取相關的設定檔屬性，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow" /> property is set to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow" /> 屬性是否設定為預設值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow" /> property is set to the default value; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute.Allow" /> 屬性設定為預設值則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
